MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the TD11 postcode area of Duns, affecting properties in Langtongate and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6.06pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived at the Willis Wynd substation and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a blown fuse. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9.15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7.15pm on Friday 5th February 2021.
